title: Looking to buy/trade for Evers cards
author: Mikehealer

posts.post_title: Looking to buy/trade for Evers cards
posts.post_content:
Looking to buy or trade for the following Evers "E" and "T" cards. 

E92 Crofts Candy
E92 Nadja 
E94 any color except green and blue
E98 red 
E106
E270 tin tops
M131

T213-3
T214, T215, T216 boston
W600


Also interested in Evers postcards-any except Sepia PC796 and Dietsche. 

Here is a link to some cards for trade. [url]http://imageevent.com/mhgt/hoft206/fortrade[/url]


If you have any for sale or trade let me know. Thanks, Mike
[url]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/url]

Always looking for Evers cards. 

Thanks
Mike

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=86865&d=1360212282[/IMG]

Mike,

I have this low grade e98 Evers red for trade. Also, has ink scribble on back. I can post a scan of the back.

Would consider trade for like condition t210-3, t213-2, better condition t205 t2-6 piedmont, SC or low grade htf t205 t206.
Thanks, I'm not sure I have anything you are looking for. Mike

Always looking for Evers cards on my wantlist. Let me know if you have any.

Thanks
Mike

I just noticed my link didn't work to my for trade page, so just in case there is something someone wants to trade for...

Thanks
Mike
